pages.title: Netherite Shovel
pages.text: $(li)The Netherite Shovel is the direct upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/diamond_shovel)Diamond Shovel$(/l).$(br)$(li)It has a greater durability than the last one and it can't be burned in fire or lava.

pages.name: Netherite Shovel
pages.text: It can be used to create Grass Path right clicking on Dirt and Grass Block and obtain Snow Balls digging Snow Blocks.
